title: Introduction
label: What can you do?
action: Please introduce yourself and describe all your capabilities. What queries can you run? What operations can you perform?

title: Ward Status
label: Current ward overview
action: What's the current ward status? How many patients are in labor, postpartum, or ready for discharge?

title: Room Availability
label: Any beds available?
action: Are there any available labor or postpartum rooms? Show me the bed labels and room numbers.

title: High-Risk Patients
label: Who needs attention?
action: Which patients are flagged as high-risk? Are there any active alerts I should know about?

title: Discharge Predictions
label: When can patients leave?
action: What are the predicted discharge times for current postpartum patients?

title: Patient List
label: Show all patients
action: Show me all current patients with their names, admission status, and assigned beds.

title: Transfer Patient
label: Move to another bed
action: I need to transfer a patient. Find a patient with a bed and an available postpartum bed, then transfer them.

title: Update Discharge
label: Change discharge time
action: Find a postpartum patient and update their predicted discharge time to 24 hours from now.

title: Schedule C-Section
label: Create surgery order
action: Schedule a C-section for a labor patient tomorrow at 9 AM. Find the patient, an attending physician, and a delivery room.

title: Create Alert
label: Flag high-risk patient
action: Create a high blood pressure alert for a labor patient. Use severity 'warning' with message about BP trending upward.

title: Provider List
label: Who's on duty?
action: Show me all providers on duty with their names, roles, and current shift status.

title: Recent Orders
label: What's scheduled?
action: Show me all medical orders created today with patient names, order types, and scheduled times.
